attributes.action: Stop women having to fight for sterilisation
attributes.additional_details: Stop the NHS making it so difficult to be sterilised
attributes.background:
Make the process for requesting to be sterilised easier. 
Currently the criteria is women have to be over 30 and already have children. Even if women fit this criteria they are being refused. 
A woman should have a choice over her own body

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/570850
